title: Question about gifting
body:
Hello;

Can Legacy skins be gifted? like "Vindicator Vayne" ?

There's no purchase option for this skin at store.

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Nope, Legacy skins are not always available in the store but may sometimes make special appearances per our [Legacy guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)  Gifting Mystery Skins do have a chance of unlocking a legacy skin, though!  It's not a guarantee, but it could show up!
